name: Who is the murderer?
description:
Synopsis:

You're a security guard in a party inside of a house, you have to look for the murderer between each other, looking the cameras.

Gameplay:

Switch between cameras, you have 5 cameras in the lower right corner looking for the murderer.

When you see the murderer press the character, but if you fail, you'll lost 1 point, just have 3 opportunities for select the character, but if you press the murderer you'll win the game. :)

You can play in the web or download the apk for Android.
